name: Watermelon, Strawberry, and Herbs
author: Christine Alexandra Deer
summary: I am always looking for ways to add herbs from my small garden to my foods. I was so delighted to find that lavender and mint go well together in this mix. Happy eating!
ingredients: ¼  watermelon, cut into bite-size pieces
4  fresh strawberries, hulled and quartered, or more to taste
1 sprig fresh mint, leaves removed and stem discarded
½ sprig fresh lavender, flowers removed and stem discarded
directions: Mix watermelon and strawberries together in a bowl; add mint leaves and lavender flowers
Squeeze lemon over watermelon mixture and stir
